Cache

Provides a simple wrapper around lru-cache to provide standard caching constructs.

Provides a decorator to allow caching at the method level throughout the system. Will rewrite the method to cache on successful responses.

  class Worker {{ "{" }}

    @Cacheable({{ "{" }} max: 1000 {{ "}" }})
    calculateExpensiveResult(expression: string) {{ "{" }}
      ...
      return value;
    {{ "}" }}
  {{ "}" }}
